title: Faulty Electron Detector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
You may roleblock a player.
You may choose a player. If anyone investigates this player, they will appear to be an Electron Gunner (3738).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If any player claims that a Faulty Electron Detector is at play, you immediately die, ending the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convince Town that one of the players is an Electron Gunner (3738). At least 3 people must claim that the same person is an Electron Gunner in one of their messages. However, if any player claims that you are the Faulty Electron Detector, you instantly fail.
